  • Constructor Details

    • Save

      public Save​(java.lang.String pathFile)
      Constructor of Save
      Parameters:
      pathFile - the path of the save file

  • Method Details

    • save

      public int save​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Object> listToSave)
      Save a list of objects
      Parameters:
      listToSave - the list to save
      Returns:
      a return code: 0 - OK 1 - The file can not be created 2 - An object has not been able to be saved inside the file 3 - The file has not been properly closed

    • load

      public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Object> load()
      Load a list of objects from a file
      Returns:
      the list of objects loaded if everything went great, null if not

    • openFile

      public int openFile​(java.lang.String newPath)
      Open the save file with a different path
      Parameters:
      newPath - the new path to open the file
      Returns:
      a return code: 0 - OK 1 - the pathFile attribute is null 2 - the file has not been found 3 - security issues has been raised 4 - an input / output error has been raised
